location: Residensi Sefina - Mont' Kiara, Greater KL

showroom.address: UEM Sunrise Showcase 21, Jalan Kiara, Mont’Kiara, 50480 Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
showroom.operating_hours: Weekdays: 9.30am to 5.30pm Weekends and Public Holidays: 10.00am to 5.00pm

description: Located in Mont’Kiara, Residensi Sefina is permanently “docked” in one of the trendiest, most affluent neighbourhoods in the Klang Valley. Well-designed accommodation comes with an abundance of facilities, set in a tropical beach theme. Mont’Kiara neighbourhood! In a world where everything is made public, it is great to be able to retreat to Allevia, the latest development by UEM Sunrise.
